lender.name: Erika
lender.occupational_info: I assist in research using a technology called MRI to study the brain.

lender.name: Julia
lender.occupational_info: I do internet stuff, mostly. I evaluate web sites and applications in order to make them easier to use.

lender.name: Marion
lender.loan_because: I would like to contribute in one small way to the world community..I am also interested in researching these loans in grad school.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student- although almost done. Interested in sustainable development and micro-lending.

lender.name: Ola
lender.occupational_info: Diabetes research in biotech company

lender.name: Megan
lender.loan_because: it's a way to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I am a sixth grade teacher in Atlanta, GA. I teach Language Arts (reading, writing, grammar, spelling) and History to eleven and twelve year olds. I do my best to teach them to be service-minded and socially responsible young adults.

lender.name: Carolyn
lender.loan_because: For a few bucks - the price of two movie tickets - I can join others to help someone increase their earning potential who otherwise could not. Lending also connects me with my neighbors across the world.
lender.occupational_info: I help City of Seattle employees learn about their healthcare and employment benefits. I help City employees increase their well being through better eating, more exercise, and practicing relaxation.

lender.name: Susan and Beck
lender.occupational_info: Susan teaches art to teenagers in public school. Beck learns about reptiles.

lender.name: Lorna
lender.loan_because: it's important to give back!
lender.occupational_info: I own a clothing store called Bodacious that caters to the curvy ladies - selling beautiful clothing in sizes 10-24.

lender.name: Alkis
lender.loan_because: My friend Brooke introduced me to this back in 2006 and I believe it's a good cause. I think the tag line "loans that change lives" is great. This way you give a chance to less fortunate people to invest in themselves.

lender.name: mark
lender.loan_because: Helping people help themselves is the best help of all.
lender.occupational_info: I develop training solutions for businesses.

lender.name: michal
lender.loan_because: i want to help @ i belive that we are all one
lender.occupational_info: we are group of woman making entertainment for abride & friends before wedding, (bachlorette party)

lender.name: SUSAN
lender.loan_because: I could either buy a book or help someone help their family, community and by extension, the world.

lender.name: Almerico & Desa
lender.loan_because:
while we personally believe debt is absolutely dumb for us, we also live in America where it is easy for us to earn money to invest in a business. So debt here is not a necessity, but a choice. We choose to be free.
However, we know that in countries less wealthy than ours, earning enough money to survive is sometimes impossible, let alone earning enough to invest in a business that allows you to thrive. So, we feel these small amounts we loan, if they will help a family generate a living and thus be free of want in the future, are worth making. And if they never get repaid, we are fortunate enough not to miss the amounts "lost" and will consider them a gift to our fellow human beings for the benefit of their happiness.
lender.occupational_info:
Very happily married with no children.
Desa, in her present occupation writes documents or edits documents that help other employees understand their job and perform it in a consistent manner. However, she is also studying for a major in Herbal Science. Her long term goal is to open her own organic, fair trade herbal products manufacturing company and farm. She's already experimenting on us with her yummy concoctions!
Almerico presently manages an outsourced sales team for AT&T in a company that he opened with his best friend. After this business is sold off, he plans to work for the company Games Workshop or to open his own gaming hobby store. Meanwhile, he's content to spend every free moment absorbed in his tabletop strategy game hobby, Warhammer 40k.

lender.name: Kya
lender.loan_because: I look forward to taking part in Kiva because I believe in the idea behind it. What a great way to empower someone, and to keep empowering those who follow after them as well.
lender.occupational_info: I want to study early childhood development so I can teach and work with children.

lender.name: Birgit
lender.loan_because: I believe together we can change the world day by day.

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: I feel this is a direct way to help people help themselves.Kiva was suggested to me by the Wichita RESULTS group leader.
lender.occupational_info: I am a full time volunteer with Trees for Life-a Wichita based global that helps folksto help themselves.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I can!

lender.name: Marc
lender.loan_because: Individuals coming together to help other people from around the world... How is that not something anyone would want to be a part of?

lender.name: Jeff
lender.occupation: Fund very small U.S. businesses; writer
lender.loan_because: To help entrepreneurs improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I fund very small U.S. businesses by purchasing their invoices. Participating in micro finance extends what I do with entrepreneurs across the world.

lender.name: Kerisa
lender.loan_because: I am "paying forward". I had helped a neighbor and she sent me a gift certificate to Kiva as a thank you. I had never heard of Kiva before - what a great concept!
lender.occupational_info: I am an assistant professor at a private, liberal arts university. I teach future teachers and early childhood education. I enjoy every minute of it!

lender.name: tufan
lender.loan_because: i should help who need it most
lender.occupational_info: just a regular job

lender.name: Junaid
lender.loan_because: Human beings are supposed to help other human beings. Duh.
lender.occupational_info: I am a law student in the United States.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: Microloans have a potential for mega social benefits.

lender.name: Kiva Engineering Team
lender.loan_because: We have to throw some cash into a jar if we're late for our daily meeting. What better way to spend that money than to support our entrepreneurs!
lender.occupational_info: We build and maintain the Kiva.org website.

lender.name: CJHS & FSHS
lender.loan_because: We want help make the world a better place by doing our share and a little bit more!

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: Docky wants me to do this for him
lender.occupational_info: Holdingback the darkness 15minutes

lender.name: Paula
lender.loan_because: I like to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the careers of musicians.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: to spite George Bush's economic stimulus payment. And because a lot of small things can make a huge difference.
lender.occupational_info: The best mix of building blocks, paint by numbers and connect the dots.

lender.name: Brad
lender.loan_because: It's a good thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I write software.

lender.name: Joel
lender.loan_because: I strongly feel that topdown government sponsored 'free' Aid is not the way forward, because it often doesn't benefit the targeted people. Bottom up approaches like Kiva are a much better approach for giving real people in need a real chance to improve their livelihood.
lender.occupational_info: I work in public health research

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I grew up on a farm, and I know how incredibly difficult it can be to survive in that life. I also know how success can make a person feel, and how it can only multiply to an even more successful future. I have received a lot of support through all of my life, and I want to do the same for others that dedicate their life to hard work.

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: I like to know where my money is going. I am pleased because it's doing good. :))
lender.occupational_info: I run the household while elderly parents run about.

lender.name: Norman and Marilyn
lender.loan_because: We beleive the world will be a better place if everyone is given a chance to help themselves provide for their family
lender.occupational_info: We are now retired. We thank God for the means to help others.

lender.name: Andrew & Amber
lender.loan_because: It's a way of having a positive impact while preserving the wealth for future use. Meanwhile, we continue to give in other ways.

lender.name: Courtney
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: i have the good fortune to be able to...and it's good karma:-)

lender.name: Vicky
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I work online helping other people get their business done more productively.

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: Some say that money makes the world go round but I like to think that there's a deeper meaning to it all than just that. Its nice to know that something commonly associated with greed and corruption and be turned into social utility, connecting people and empowering them in the most economically simplistic way.
lender.occupational_info: Aspiring urban geographer

lender.name: Jeremy
lender.loan_because: I invest in people and not in mutual funds.

lender.name: Sharlene
lender.loan_because: I simply want to help others achieve their dreams.

lender.name: Ken & Faith
lender.loan_because: independence is one of greatest gifts we can give one another.
lender.occupational_info: light networkers; health renewal & total wellness

lender.name: Kimberley and Rod
lender.loan_because: We are lucky enough to be in a position where we are able to help someone else, so we do.
lender.occupational_info: I work with people who have had strokes or brain tumours or diseases. I teach them how to speak, read, write, understand and swallow again.

lender.name: Cornelis
lender.loan_because: I care about people
lender.occupational_info: As indicated, I am a painter. I am interested in people and that is what I paint a lot, people, portraits, but also animals and landscapes.

lender.name: Brett
lender.loan_because: I enjoy to help people help themselves!

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I think the best way to help others is to make them able to help themselves

lender.name: Andreas
lender.loan_because: Im too greedy to give :-D
lender.occupational_info: I make stuff on the internet.

lender.name: Joseph Law
lender.loan_because: There is a wise Chinese saying "Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime". I support this kind of giving as it empowers the recipient to live a life with dignity and confidence, rather than reliance.
lender.occupational_info: Joseph Law is the founder and CEO of Living Greatness, a social organization dedicated to making the world a happier and better place by empowering people's lives through education and charity. Joseph is the author of Living Greatness: A Practical Guide to Living an Enlightened Life. His work has attracted and won the support of international best-selling authors, leading CEOs, as well as billionaires and celebrities worldwide. He is an ambassador for Make-A-Wish Australia.

lender.name: Michaela
lender.loan_because: it helps others

lender.name: Allan
lender.loan_because: Its nice to see so little money do so much good!
lender.occupational_info: I program data collection systems for Industrial automation equipment.

lender.name: Leigh
lender.loan_because: This is the best way to enable others to become sucessful.

lender.name: Anders Brenna
lender.loan_because: Kiva really works, and because it is a great example of how internet can be used to create a better world
lender.occupational_info: I'm in charge with making my employeer an integrated part of the internet.

lender.name: Bethany
lender.loan_because: In a few years time, I hope to be serving others by giving of my time. Until then, this is the next best thing
lender.occupational_info: I'm studying Anthropology at Harvard College

lender.name: Ashley
lender.loan_because: "Dreams are the touchstones of our character." -Henry David Thoreau
lender.occupational_info: I make sure people have to most enjoyable time they can when spoiling themselves in a spa setting.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I am thankfully fortunate enough to be able to.

lender.name: Octavia
lender.loan_because: I love people and people are always very good to me so I pass it on.
lender.occupational_info: I design houses, interiors, kitchens, baths and gardens and it is very rewarding work and lots of fun for me.

lender.name: Christiane
lender.occupational_info: i´m teaching drama in education: theater is everywhere!

lender.name: steve
lender.loan_because: I have been so blessed just by being born in the USA and I believe, as the bible teaches, that we are here to reflect God's love to others by sharing and giving to those who have less.
lender.occupational_info: Review design and manufacturing records to certify equipment meets ASME codes and standards.

lender.name: Nina
lender.loan_because: i can. it's a way to help, without costs for me and with visible success.

lender.name: Vicky
lender.loan_because: It fills my heart with joy to help as many people as possible to better their lives, to give them a hand to move forward, because I care

lender.name: Nadine
lender.loan_because: I should. People need breaks. Some more than others.

lender.name: Suzanne
lender.loan_because: Kiva offers me the opportunity to continue helping people, and in doing so, to assist many more people the opportunity to realize their dreams and to create a better life for themselves and their families. No matter who we are, or where we live, we all want something better for our children and this is a wonderful program to aid people in achieving that reality.
lender.occupational_info: Rewarding! Knowing that I have the ability to assist my clients in the purchase of their home, whether it is their first home or their dream home, or re-financing to make funds available for that "dream purchase" or funds for college tuition or helping their children get off to a good start.

lender.name: Viet
lender.loan_because: we are blessed with so much and we have to learn to appreciate and give back to the world and to those who are less fortunate but with the same drive to succeed and provide.
lender.occupational_info: Started my first business in the water industry and looking to expand into other interests.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: Microfinancing actually helps people.
lender.occupational_info: I'm perusing a double major in international affairs and history.

lender.name: Tracy
lender.loan_because: I was inspired by Jessica at Building Learning Communities '08 in Boston, MA..... this, I'm sure, will continue to change as I experience kiva.org!

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.occupation: retired, volunteer english as second language teac

lender.name: Bianca
lender.loan_because: You can do a world of good with even a tiny bit of money.

lender.name: lorenzo
lender.loan_because: Jibijob.com somos portal dedicado a la moda, a la pasarela, a las agencias de publicidad, a crear oportunidades para la gente que le interesen los espectáculos, la moda, la parafernalia de lo fashion. Adéntrate en ese maravilloso mundo registrándote a la pagina www.jibijob.com y accede a tu ficha, créate tu book, participa en concursos, gana festivales, se la persona mas votada, chatea con los usuarios, entérate de las ultimas tendencias, todo en una sola pagina. www.jibijob.com TE ESPERAMOS
lender.occupational_info: Jibijob.com somos portal dedicado a la moda, a la pasarela, a las agencias de publicidad, a crear oportunidades para la gente que le interesen los espectáculos, la moda, la parafernalia de lo fashion. Adéntrate en ese maravilloso mundo registrándote a la pagina www.jibijob.com y accede a tu ficha, créate tu book, participa en concursos, gana festivales, se la persona mas votada, chatea con los usuarios, entérate de las ultimas tendencias, todo en una sola pagina. www.jibijob.com TE ESPERAMOS

lender.name: Scott
lender.occupational_info: I teach art history and European history

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I want to do my small part to open up opportunities for others. I hope the support I give here will help some people build better lives for themselves and their families.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: I'm a business woman and understand the importance of business capital!
lender.occupational_info: I sell food to restaurants and casinos in Las Vegas

lender.name: Rainer
lender.loan_because: I like to give (and receive, too)
lender.occupational_info: I teach my colleagues how to deal with customers (on the phone).

lender.name: Stella & David
lender.occupational_info: Founders of PIPforia, LLC Currency Traders/Educators

lender.name: Kara
lender.loan_because: I want to help people get the funding they otherwise would not be able to get.

lender.name: Justin
lender.loan_because: It makes the world a little better place.

lender.name: Sascha
lender.loan_because: I believe that donations are good and needed for desaster releive - but when it comes to sustainable development there is nothing like creating the opportunity for people to help themselves. Give money to people directly and encourage them to build and expand their business is way better than making donations as you never know to which corrupted regime your money will drain to...

lender.name: david
lender.loan_because: i believe that since God has given me the resources to help people i will give it back to Him by loaning to people in need

lender.name: Lynda
lender.occupation: Letter Carrier for Post Office and Writer

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because:
As a small business owner myself, I know how important capitalization is.
I also think that anyone with a good idea who is willing to work hard should have the opportunity to put their dreams in action- no matter where they live.
The main reason, however, that I loan is because it makes me happy. People helped me when I got started and now I can help others.
lender.occupational_info: I help families plan and save for their financial futures.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: I feel very blessed in my life and want to do my share to help others. I would like to support especially women with young children, as I am in a family/work situation as well.

lender.name: Seema
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Stefano
lender.occupational_info: Italian information technology consultant, specialized in network security, now in the logistics field. I’m a relentless, outspoken and passionate geek since ever.

lender.name: Andrea Knagenhjelm
lender.loan_because: I want to help people have a better life. I like this idea because you are actually loaning money directly to the person in question without middlemen. A little for us is alot for others. We are so privileged , why not share this with others!
lender.occupational_info: I work with administrating network computers and applications on them.

lender.name: Khalid
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving everyone a chance to prove themselves, and because it's a better, sustainable way of giving. I owe my love of business and entrepreneurship to the first loan my parents gave me as a kid.
lender.occupational_info: I run marketing & business development efforts for a firm that specializes in commercial interiors.

lender.name: Eva
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate with so many things and it feels good to give something back!

lender.name: Dana
lender.loan_because: In my past banking life I had to turn down many applicants for bank loans. Need and entrepreneurial skills were never the criteria that was used. I heard many stories that broke my heart. Loans were made based on risk models alone and I had no power to overturn declines. I like being able to loan a small amount of money and have it positively impact someone's life.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who are trying to make a better life for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am the only computer person for a small insurance company. I do all of the programming and fix the hardware when needed.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I believe in hard working people. They always seeking for chances to improve their lives with hard works.
lender.occupational_info: Just a little helping hand.

lender.name: valerie
lender.loan_because: I want to share some of my good fortune with others, to let them know that others care and want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I helped to take care of sick people, and helped communities develop ways to provide health services to the general population.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: the only difference between the entrepenuers on this site and myself is the countries we were born in. Neither of us got to choose, and neither of us were more deserving of our places of birth. Since I was lucky enough to be born in Canada, it's my responsibility to help those who got less lucky than myself. No matter where we're born, we all deserve a fair shot at life.

lender.name: Miryam Lavalle
lender.loan_because: We can make a better world,for us and our children, if we help each other.
lender.occupational_info: I help other people and their children to get better chances in Germany through a good Integration.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: Two reasons: I can and I care.
lender.occupational_info: Rewarding.

lender.name: Don & Rachel
lender.loan_because: We want to share our resources with other hard-working people.

lender.name: Phil & Pam
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Shelli /ALI Gateway
lender.loan_because: I am an English teacher and this is money raised and donated by my international English language students. My husband and I match the donations. We believe in people helping people. :)
lender.occupational_info: English teacher

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: Yunus makes sense; in my experience the best ideas are simple and make sense.
lender.occupational_info: I support the trading operations of a multinational investment bank.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: it changes lives which in turn changes communities.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: "The cynic knows the price of everything and the value of nothing." It's time for me to give back after a lifetime of taking. I believe in "Karma" and I'm sure what I do in this life will echo forever in the next. I hold fundamentally to the theory that what I do to others will be done to me and that everyone is equal. So giving is receiving is giving...
lender.occupational_info: I work on an Island in Indonesia called Halmahera. Manado is the closest big city on the Island of Sulawesi, just 1.5 hrs flight west of the Mine site. We mine gold. I work as a project engineer on the expansion of the Gosowong Goldmine owned by Newcrest Mining.

lender.name: Gia-Ninh
lender.loan_because: Every person deserves the opportunity to create success in their life and provide for their community. Besides, Mama told me it's polite to share. :-]
lender.occupational_info: I help people live healthier lives by teaching group fitness.

lender.name: Becky
lender.loan_because: I would like to help others have a chance for a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I teach fourth grade students reading, writing, math, social studies, science, and global awareness.

lender.name: Glen
lender.loan_because: If enough people help in small ways, there can be a big difference overall.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the hospitality business (hotels and food and beverage), so I have an affinity for restauranteurs anywhere. It's a tough way to make a living under the best of circumstances!

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: with what seems like very little to me I can help others support their families and achieve new levels of independence. It's great to see hard working people build their dreams!
lender.occupational_info: I help people be better leaders and hopefully better people - I work with business people to put their best abilities to work in a way that makes them feel like their efforts mean something.

lender.name: Zack
lender.loan_because: I think this is such a great, smart, and effective way to help those in need in other countries, to help them build their own sustainable economies through my support, and I am proud to give back. This foundation - Kiva - is truly a blessing. I am grateful that even with a little bit of my money, I can help someone and their family tenfold across the world.

lender.name: Janina
lender.loan_because: Many of the families I work with are from Guatemala, Nicaragua, Mexico, and Honduras. I want to help the hard working women who live in these countries.
lender.occupational_info: I am a police detective. I investigate crimes against children.

lender.name: Maihan
lender.loan_because: I believe in people. And I believe in the possibilities of social changes through economic progress.

lender.name: Blanca
lender.loan_because: need it someone.
lender.occupational_info: I am a girl of dog kind is JRT. I play futbol sometime. I wish I'll own my club "JRT club de futbol". I love Raul Gonzalez Blanco who was the Captain of Real Madrid used be then now being with FC Shalke04 in Germany. My mam makes dad happly. My dad making a software works on the www.

lender.name: Arturo
lender.loan_because: I get self-satisfaction in knowing that I'm helping someone put food on their family's table!

lender.name: Myun
lender.loan_because: There are so many thing that makes us unhappy. Among those, something that we can elemination, we should do it.

lender.name: Sherry and Aaron
lender.loan_because: We have been blessed in so many ways; and have a resposibility to give back and make someone's day...even the smallest of acts can make a big difference!

lender.name: Mary
lender.occupational_info: I do bookkeeping for small businesses and enjoy being a part of their successes. My hobbies include weaving, baking and learning about our world.

lender.name: Tom Cotter
lender.loan_because:
Micro loans are a wonderful way to encourage entrepreneurs around the world. These businesses not only benefit the owners and their families but help build healthy local economies to overcome poverty on a larger scale. I am especially interested in loans that foster sustainability practices, recycling and renewable energy.
Join our Kiva team! http://kiva.org/team/RealGoodsSolar
lender.occupational_info: I hold a deep desire to re-think, to re-design and build a positive future. My roles as father, clergy, manager, consultant, speaker, community organizer, and professor have provided a unique perspective on the challenges we face and the changes required to overcome them. I see the end of the era of cheap fossil fuels and key materials, coupled with rising population and anxieties around water resources, food production and harmful wastes, as clearly demonstrating the need to rethink our model of production and consumption, not merely attempting to patch it up. I share an optimism that this rethinking will bring a better quality of life and increased opportunities as it can potentially restore natural and social capital.

lender.name: Emmanuel
lender.loan_because: I wanna be one to make a difference in someones Life. I Live for helping others and letting others know that someone DOES care.
lender.occupational_info: I'm simply trying to Live Life to the fullest, Loving without end and helping others with my wisdom and experiences.

lender.name: Peggy - Littleton, CO
lender.loan_because: the kindness and generosity of just one person provides a resource that will benefit many people.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: i want to help people in third world countries get back on their feet.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I think this is a great opportunity to help people that are working hard to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I fix computer hardware and software problems.

lender.name: Drew
lender.loan_because: I hope to make a difference in the world one day.

lender.name: Elaine
lender.loan_because: I really believe in this concept--helping others help their families and their lives. Friends lend to friends and just because I don't have the opportunity to meet these people doesn't mean I wouldn't be their friend!

lender.name: TJ and Jamie
lender.loan_because: I have the ability to. I want to give somebody else the chance to do what they really want to but might not have the money on hand.
lender.occupational_info: My partner and I are middle school teachers in Los Angeles. Our students are so amazing and important because they are the future.

lender.name: Evan
lender.occupational_info: I own a company that develops business software.

lender.name: Nicholas
lender.loan_because: I'm a firm believer in the good of global capitalism- and I've decided to put my money where my mouth is (what little of it I have at the moment, as a full-time teacher and part-time graduate student).
lender.occupational_info: I teach Conversational and Business English to students and professionals in Shanghai. In my spare time, I take classes, study Chinese, and ponder what industry I can do the most good in.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: I should.

lender.name: Srini
lender.loan_because: I want to make the needy happy

lender.name: Tafsir
lender.loan_because: i love the thought of directly helping an individual. to know that your money is used for a good purpose and to trust somebody else.... i think kiva is a perfect way to make this world a better place.... and to participate in this progress ;)
lender.occupational_info:
i'm working in a little media-agency. television broadcasters (like dw - the german world television - and local broadcasters) are some of our clients. most of the time i'm working as a video editor...
besides that i love meeting my best friends, make music sometimes and love surfing :D

lender.name: Charles
lender.occupation: Country Director of an International NGO
lender.loan_because: I've been blessed with so much and see this as an opportunity to bless others in return.
lender.occupational_info: I'm involved in relief and development work helping people to meet their basic needs.

lender.name: Ange-Camea
lender.loan_because: The perfect way to make the world a better place and to become producers, not only consumers. It's a simple and transparent organisation, so I can track where my money goes to and what is done with it

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: we all know - sadly more than in the past - just how important it is to have access to money in order to build small businesses and generate thriving local economies
lender.occupational_info: I've been in the food industry most of my working life and I want to support small business in food and catering (especially any that are bakery related - so if you spot one and want to tell me about it, please do). I also try to choose entrepreneurs in countries I have visited or ones of particular interest to me. Good luck to all the entrepreneurs!

lender.name: Susan
lender.whereabouts: Mt St Thomas New South Wales

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: I have witnessed situations first-hand in which micro-lending may have changed someone's life. Kiva satisfies my need to give and my desire to watch the results help others.
lender.occupational_info: My role is a facilitator, helping others apply their crafts.

lender.name: Vinh
lender.loan_because: I care! It's a fantastic way of helping growing businesses around the world in the comfort of your own chair.

lender.name: Sarah Jane
lender.loan_because: I want to empower people to help themselves out of poverty and have the pride in themselves to not have to rely on handouts.
lender.occupational_info: I teach kids aged 11-18 to be artists in a British school in the Middle East

lender.name: Barb
lender.loan_because: it's an easy and fun way to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I provide K-9 behavioral rehabilitation, regardless of age, issues, or severity of issues-specializing in aggressive dogs.

lender.name: Charles & Xander
lender.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves. And, I want my son to participate in helping other people.
lender.occupational_info: I help people save and invest money.

lender.name: Scott Carl
lender.loan_because: I like to help when I can.
lender.occupational_info: I scour financial markets, looking for opportunities.

lender.name: Harm & Margo
lender.loan_because: "And as we let our own light shine, we unconsciously give other people permission to do the same”. We firmly believe in this quote from Nelson Mandela and being small business owners and interprid dreamers ourselves we are proud to be in a position that enables us - albeit modestely - to give others across the globe a chance to live their dreams!
lender.occupational_info: Harm: R&D Manager Margo: owner consultancy in the educational field (mainly non profit, museums and libraries) Check out one of our dreams that we are working on: www.playingpolo.org

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: People are an inspiration to other people. By helping a person to grow and propser, that person will be able to help another person grow and propser. It creates a virus that could change this entire planet for the better and I want to be a part of that.

lender.name: Vilfred
lender.loan_because: I believe that micro loaning is a clever and direct way to help peoble improve their businesses.
lender.occupational_info: Consulting in the field of urban and rural development.

lender.name: Chen Family
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves to have hope and the opportunity to make a change.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: we are rich by what we give

lender.name: mariya
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the NYC Council. Half the time I help constituents and deal with a councilman's schedule. The other half of the time I work on legislation.

lender.name: yuki
lender.occupational_info: learning internaional studies.

lender.name: Dennis
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Builder.

lender.name: Theo
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be able to do so. For me it is great to see that with one loan others can become so much more self sufficient.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I live in the United States of America, one of the easiest countries in the world to get on your feet or change your situation. That being said I also know what it's like to have absolutly nothing and not able to get any financial help. We all need help to get started!

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: Innovation is one aspect to change. I hope that loans I make can help to be a catalyst for positive change in someone's life or community.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a Communications Management Consultant in order to ensure that the right communication gets transmitted to individuals, groups and divisions in companies.

lender.name: Marc
lender.loan_because: I was in Phnom Penh for a couple of days in 2007, and took a motorcycle ride to Choeung Ek. On the way back to my hotel, the driver told me about how he owned this motorcycle, but sometimes he could borrow his brother-in-law's car to make even more money, transporting bigger groups in comfort. He was curious about life in America, and when he heard that I used to have a car, he got excited and asked if I could loan him money to buy a car, too. Before I could answer, he quickly sketched out a repayment plan, describing month-by-month how much money he would repay me. Of course, I barely had any money (I'd sold the car a while back), let alone the amount he needed, so I had to turn him down. But it left me with the feeling that he could do great things if he had the chance. So, through Kiva, I hope I can finance a few people like him.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a freelance writer in Chicago.

lender.name: Reilly
lender.occupational_info: I help people deal with emotional issues they're facing.

lender.name: Leslie
lender.loan_because: I wish for people to get ahead...have some choices, and to be given a chance to try...
lender.occupational_info: I travel between hospitals in our region to share education sessions with nurses on new equipment/supplies and procedures needed for women and child care focus. I move information from research into practice... to benefit the care of our patients. I write learning packages within my expertise, to prepare new staff for their roles .

lender.name: Vittorio
lender.loan_because: We don't have to have much, it's what we do with what we have that really matters.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: All's fair in love and finance? Not always. Kiva helps.
lender.occupational_info: I had the privilege to serve as a Kiva Fellow with four very different partner lending institutions. I met many Kiva-funded borrowers to learn how the loans they took impacted their lives, and worked with partner microfinance institutions to build capacity and help them be as successful as possible on Kiva.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I can...

lender.name: Gwen
lender.loan_because: we are all connected

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: I'd like to do more.
lender.occupational_info: I translate literature from Spanish and Portuguese into English. I also translate for Kiva when I have time.

lender.name: emanuele
lender.loan_because: I'd like to help people, instead of frittering money away on useless things.
lender.occupational_info: helpful, understanding

lender.name: Jason & Annelise
lender.loan_because: God cares about those in need. Jesus said, "For I was hungry and you gave me something to eat, I was thirsty and you gave me something to drink, I was a stranger and you invited me in, I needed clothes and you clothed me, I was sick and you looked after me, I was in prison and you came to visit me." (Matthew 25: 35-36)

lender.name: Annette
lender.loan_because: "I care about our future and people". "We can all help one another in some way even if it's a small impact it can make a big difference in someone's life".
lender.occupational_info: I work in the transportation industry and meet with a wide variety of clients who use my company's products and services.

lender.name: Haley
lender.loan_because: "...whatever you did for one of the least of these brothers of mine, you did for me."

lender.name: Allison & Melissa
lender.loan_because: you never forget what living in poverty feels like and thankful every day that you've been given the opportunity to rise above it!
lender.occupational_info: We provide IT products, services and full system support/ training to small business & nonprofits.

lender.name: J. "Omar"
lender.loan_because: in my small way, I want to assist in growing the industry that has been my passion and livelihood for many years.
lender.occupational_info: Director - Food and Beverage in the Cinema Industry

lender.name: Prashant
lender.loan_because: Structural violence needs to go.

lender.name: Diego
lender.loan_because: As the buddhist proverb says: "The constant dripping of water wears away the stone"

lender.name: Bonnie
lender.loan_because: We are all neighbors, and we help our neighbors in need.
lender.occupational_info: I am responsible for all the systems that maintain employee records and for ensuring we are in legal compliance.

lender.name: Crisann
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone should have the opportunity to improve themselves.

lender.name: Rob Kubasko
lender.loan_because: Sometimes people need a little inspiration to follow their dreams and make a difference.

lender.name: AH Group
lender.occupation: Medical and Food Stamp Eligibility Workers

lender.name: Goldengurl04
lender.loan_because: because I can and I want to help .
lender.occupational_info: I work nights in a busy hospital. I take care of all types of patients. I give them medications to make them better.

lender.name: Rachael
lender.loan_because: I am lucky enough to be able to.
lender.occupational_info: I teach history and sewing to high school students (ages 14-18).

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: Because nothing on this earth really belongs to us. We are all on borrowed time and i believe that its not what you do makes you who you are but how you do it. I love Nicaragua a lot and think it is the best place i have been to in this world.

lender.name: Rich
lender.loan_because: every little bit helps. If each of us did just a little, a lot could be accomplished. Lives could be changed. Lives could be saved.
lender.occupational_info: I am a semi-retired web entrepreneur. I play on the internet - I build websites.

lender.name: shellie
lender.loan_because: I am the owner of my small art business and want to help those who need it!
lender.occupational_info: I create one of a kind fabric on wood art pieces. I sell my work online to people all over the world.

lender.name: Jacklyn
lender.loan_because: I count on others to help me everyday and I want to give where and when I can.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an Engineering-related bookstore.

lender.name: Runako Designs
lender.loan_because: I love the stories! Most importantly, I feel as though I am planting a seed into something that Matters.
lender.occupational_info: I am in the business of hiring professionals for a manufacturing facility. I also mentor and teach employees and managers. As a jewelry artist I make handcrafted jewelry.

lender.name: Ignatius Darren Gozali
lender.loan_because: I dont know you but I care about you, you suffer and I want to help, you need help and I am trying to be available, either you ask for help or not, Jesus is always available to be your first helper, His love for you makes me want to help you even more
lender.occupational_info: Aiming for technology and art sufficiency and better capability to the next level where it is ubiquitously available on earth, in order to have especially those who are unreachable and voiceless in life experience positive benefits out of it toward peace, better life supports, and morally neat society,

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I travel the world, and work with the wealthy. This is my way of balancing things out with those I pass on the road of life.....
lender.occupational_info: Operate a think tank network of several hundred executives across the global apparel supply chain - from yarn spinning to global brands and retailers.

lender.name: Dennis
lender.loan_because: We are all on this planet together for a short time, and need to make the most of it.
lender.occupational_info: I work towards clean energy solutions to climate change.

lender.name: GregAndJulie
lender.loan_because: My wife and I work with our consulting clients to make a difference in the world with some of the proceeding from major contracts we sign.
lender.occupational_info: Internet Marketing Strategist - I help business owners and Entrepreneurs get more traffic and make more money from their websites. Our business site is http://InternetMarketingDoneForYou.com

lender.name: Ron & Doris
lender.loan_because: It is part of our effort to promote peace and justice in the world.

lender.name: Percy N
lender.loan_because: I am blessed and can help others.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: What an incredible way to link people from around the world. Everyone needs help in making their business ideas a reality. I feel privileged to help all these courageous entrepreneurs.

lender.name: Johnny BankBook
lender.loan_because: this is one of the coolest deals around town, as you well know by now......just happy to participate and contribute when possible.

lender.name: Jefferey
lender.loan_because: A good person gave me a gift certificate and I'm finally giving it a go. I hope it works!
lender.occupational_info: Manage money

lender.name: Sam Petrie
lender.loan_because: I want to help women in other countries build businesses and lead independent lives.
lender.occupational_info: I sell software that helps big companies engage employees in volunteering and charitable giving to build stronger communities.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.occupational_info: I purchase information technology equipment and support services.

lender.name: The Benefield Family
lender.loan_because: We are very fortunate and would like to help others do the things we take for granted.
lender.occupational_info: My company writes and sells books to the medical industry.

lender.name: Dina
lender.loan_because: It is a little thing I can do that can make a big difference to someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I organise medical and nursing education.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: Together we make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I ask the questions that help create the environments that enable people to learn.

lender.name: Jan
lender.loan_because: It's rewarding to help empower someone to improve their lives and their financial position.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: Maybe I can help someone that has less than most, for such a small amount of money I get a great feeling of joy giving a chance to someone who wants to help themselves and there family!
lender.occupational_info: I Did operator a water treatment plant that puts out clean safe drinking water, something that is taken for granted

lender.name: Taro
lender.loan_because: I would like to provide entrepreneurs who make an incredible effort to emerge from poverty with chance for economically independent living.
lender.occupational_info:
I work for one of the most influential think-tank in Japan, as a member of “Corporate Strategy Consulting Department”.
We receive requests from not only the government but also private companies to cooperate in analyzing business trends, and then propose various specific improvement activities, such as improvement of the financial situation. In my company, I am responsible for market research and the financial analysis of clients.

lender.name: Aleatha
lender.loan_because: I think empowering small businesses helps everyone around them, and gives people a long-term foundation for lifting themselves out of poverty.

lender.name: Natacha
lender.loan_because: We are all one big family that shares the earth.Helping other people is rewarding. I admire all the borrowers on the site, who believe in themselves and want to take their dream further. And hello to all fellow lenders, People are Good !
lender.occupational_info: I advise companies doing business in Asia and the US and provide relocation services for their staff.

lender.name: Campbell
lender.loan_because: Money is like a light bulb to a battery, people are the batteries and money allows them to shine.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the direct selling industry, helping people setup and run their own home based business across the world marketing a wide range of unique and everyday consumable products.

lender.name: Monica
lender.loan_because: Life is a circle, good actions always bring good results; helping each other we also help ourselves and let a positive energy flows around the world.
lender.occupational_info: Communicate!

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I want to make a contribution to the global community.
lender.occupational_info: I am a junior doctor a keen traveller and volunteer.

lender.name: krisanata maydelyn
lender.loan_because: being a sinlge mom is not that easy.i want ro earn money of my own. i want to have my own little business for my Son's future and to provide enough amount for living.
lender.occupational_info: i am responsible and workaholic. rest assured that if given a chance or oppurtunity to loan io would do my best for whatever responsibilities conferred upon me.

lender.name: rebecca
lender.loan_because: it makes me happy to help others. I think Kiva is a great idea to link people who have with people who need; crossing borders and cultures with ease.

lender.name: Thekla
lender.loan_because: I have more than I need and others - only because they live on the other side of the world - have very often less than the basic needs... isn´t that reason enough??

lender.name: Narcisse Mbunzama
lender.loan_because: I would like to develop an IT company
lender.occupational_info: Excellent, inovative

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference
lender.occupational_info: I am very involved in volunteer work, mostly at a leadership level.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who are willing to have a go.
lender.occupational_info: Growing more produce with less water and less impact on the environment.

lender.name: Wayne Coburn
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.

lender.name: Sasha
lender.loan_because: This could be me and I would like someone to give me a chance and a helping hand when I needed it - it's a marvellous idea !!
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers when I am not herding sheep

lender.name: Tina
lender.loan_because: it makes sense

lender.name: Hideki
lender.loan_because: I can and would like to help others.

lender.name: Gnosis Lodge
lender.loan_because: Freemasonry is an ancient system designed to impart morality, ethics and teach mutual service to its members. Instead of lecture or sermon, Freemasonry instructs its members by the performance of ceremonial degrees, each one with its own distinct teachings, symbols and message. Thus the Freemason is taught by experience to serve God, help his fellow man and better himself.
lender.occupational_info: American Co-Masonry is an organization whose purpose is to provide a guide to its members for their spiritual growth through a series of progressive steps. Co-Masonry counts among its members men and women of all races, creeds, colors, and nationalities who are 21 years of age or older, have a belief in a Supreme Being, and a desire for more understanding about the spiritual nature of mankind.

lender.name: Silke
lender.loan_because: it is a great idea

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: Life can really suck without help.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an American working in Tokyo.

lender.name: Kyle
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference and this is one small step that I'm taking.
lender.occupational_info: I am attending the University of Alabama working towards a Mechanical Engineering degree. I also have a job at Hunt Refining where I work under the engineers and try and learn some stuff.

lender.name: Cara
lender.occupational_info: Coordinate on-line and in person education programs for students with special needs

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I admire those who take the initiative to better their lives.

lender.name: Judy & Rob

lender.occupational_info: I no longer work full time, but I do stay busy doing accounting and tax work a few hours per week.

lender.name: Luis
lender.loan_because: I believe that micro-finance is the best way to promote development.
lender.occupational_info: I mobilize resources for donations to finance social and environmental projects in Latin America and the Caribbean.

lender.name: stef
lender.loan_because: i want pass along the same generosity others have so kindly given me

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can think of no better way to help someone directly, without middle men taking their share or executives being paid salaries. I loan because I recently inherited a small amount and I feel I should use a tiny portion to help a small business owner with the drive but without the funds.
lender.occupational_info: I have been a computer tech for 15 years and have recently decided to enter the field of Taxi driving. Perhaps the karma of giving will come around and my new venture will also be successful

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I think that supporting local businesses is important, and can also mean supporting new local businesses across the globe. If I can help make a difference in the lives of others, I will do my best to do so.
lender.occupational_info: I write in my free time and work in the office of a local business during the day time.

lender.occupational_info: I help do experiments to learn about how people process language

lender.loan_because: I believe.
lender.occupational_info: I teach children who are Deaf.

lender.occupational_info: I work in a research lab, finding drugs to treat neglected parasitic diseases.

lender.name: Ibs
lender.loan_because: I am privileged to have some disposable income. Making it available for others to use through Kiva is my way of trying to make a little difference in other people's lives.
lender.occupational_info: I maintain systems used for voice communications over the internet.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I've seen how partnership at the local level makes a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I study international relations.

lender.occupational_info: in comparison to the majority looking for loans, too little work for too much money.

lender.name: Catherine

lender.loan_because: I learned about the site from the History teacher and upon graduating, I got a gift certificate to sponsor someone.
lender.occupational_info: I'm just a student at a private college.
